title: # 541 - Liver King & ME
itunes:title: # 541 - Liver King & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with Liver King! We talk about priorities, how much sleep you should be getting, the 9 ancestral tenants, why he doesn’t shower or brush his teeth, steroid accusations, his daily routine. Then, we eat liver, bone marrow, and testicles! 

 

Follow Liver King

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/liverking 

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCI_-0r4erTCjpHRWMANAQiQ 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mad Rabbit Tattoo. Go to http://www.madrabbit.com/bertcast and use the promo code “BERTCAST” for 25% off.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Beard Club. Grow your best beard today and take 20% off your first order when you go to http://www.Beardclub.com/bert and use code “BERT”

 

This episode is also brought to you by Rex MD. Go to http://www.rexmd.com/bert to get started with a starter pack prescription of generic Viagra or Cialis

 

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop Go to http://www.whoop.com and enter code BERT to save 10% off. To join the 2 Bears, 0 Drinks Team: https://app.whoop.com/mobile-redir?code=COMM-2BEARS (Mobile only)

 

This episode is also brought to you by Liver King. Get a bag of Whole Feast at http://www.thefittest.com
